title: Help me choose a Champion please
body:
I haven't played much after Season 4 started and now I have new champs to unlock but I dunno whom.

The champs I don't have are all the new ones:
>Azir
>Gnar
>Kalista
>Braum
>Rek'Sai
>Vel Koz 
>Yasuo

I see lots of people use Azir and Yasuo.
Nobody ever uses Vel Koz. Ocassionally I see Rek'Sai, Kalista and Gnar.

From Shit to God tier, how would you rate their current strength?

replies.body: Rek'sai, Yasuo and Braum are quite fun but hard to play right

braum isnt hard....QQQQQ aint no one going nowhere.
oh getting engaged on? W to the ally being engaged on. E to block incoming projectiles. R if too many enemies close.
build tanky.

done and done.

Lemme point out this just my opinion from trash to god tier
Azir
Gnar
Braum
Vel'koz
Kalista
Rek'sai
Yasu-OP
Are you really saying Gnar is trash LMAO
well he has braum and azir at the top...so i think his list is backwards....because kalista is near the bottom. but then reksai being at the bottom is wrong too...since she is actually OP.

> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ERQd1oEj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-31T00:21:43.150+0000)
>
> Lemme point out this just my opinion from trash to god tier
> Azir
> Gnar
> Braum
> Vel'koz
> Kalista
> Rek'sai
> Yasu-OP

LOL Yasuo is not OP he is easy to shut down just play the game right

best to worst...{{champion:201}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:157}} ......a long long way...... {{champion:429}} 

azir is really good but hard to play. yas is fine but easy to smash early on but can become a god late game with the right team comp.
the others are pretty easy overall.

kalista isnt a real champ.

IMO gnar and vel'koz are the most fun out of those peoples, and I all about the funzies. Havent played kalista or rek'sai, azir sucks, yasuos play style is un-interesting (to me anyway)and braum is ok-ish

I would probably pick Gnar out of those simply because I play top. Azir or Rek'Sai would be my second choice.

I wouldn't get Kalista unless you've already tried her out and like her.

SHT: {{champion:429}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:421}} :GOD
